thread.title: Kudlow says 'not at detailed point' on China negotiations

title: Kudlow says 'not at detailed point' on China negotiations
text:
Kudlow says 'not at detailed point' on China negotiations Sunday, May 20, 2018 - 01:15
President Donald Trump's top economic advisor, Larry Kudlow, tells CBS News' Face the Nation program they've made 'a lot of progress' in U.S.-China trade talks, but 'there's a lot of numbers being thrown around' and 'we're not at that detailed point.' Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
President Donald Trump's top economic advisor, Larry Kudlow, tells CBS News' Face the Nation program they've made 'a lot of progress' in U.S.-China trade talks, but 'there's a lot of numbers being thrown around' and 'we're not at that detailed point.' Rough Cut (no reporter narration). //reut.rs/2LcHeCh
